subtitle: A very quick starter to make and an ideal way of using up any leftover Stilton or your favourite blue cheese.

method.text: Place hard-boiled eggs, cheese, yogurt, lemon juice and walnuts in a blender or food processor. Blend or process until smooth. Then pour in the dissolved gelatine.
Whisk the egg whites up until they just stand in soft peaks. Fold into the cheese mixture and season well. Pour the mixture into a greased 450 g loaf tin. Chill for 3 hours, or until set.
To serve: Turn out onto a serving plate and serve in slices.

title: Stilton walnut mousse
